forecast.name: Today

forecast.name: Tonight

weather_report:
Boston awakens beneath a veil of clouds that stretch like whispering shadows across the sky—a muted grey heralding the day ahead. With a high near 24, the air carries a bite that will chill even the most robust of spirits. The wind dances through the streets, swirling at speeds that send a shiver down the spine, making it crucial to bundle up if venturing outside. Cozy woolen layers, a sturdy scarf, and perhaps a well-fitted beanie will serve you well against the stinging chill, while insulated boots can guard against the bite of frost beneath your feet.

As the day meanders on, the clouds may shift slightly, though they will likely hold onto their somber hue. With a low this evening around 10, the atmosphere won’t yield much warmth, but the night could offer its own charms—hot beverages serenading you with comfort as the world outside glimmers with a frost-kissed sheen. Ample time spent indoors would be no travesty; perhaps dive deeply into that book you've been meaning to read or take solace in the melodic notes of your favorite album, allowing the warm embrace of home to cradle you against the briskness beyond. If you must venture out, embrace the brisk air with appreciation, perhaps enjoying a solitary stroll through a nearby park, where the trees stand sentinel in their winter glory, or take in the history of a local café, letting the rich aroma of coffee fill the air.
